title: The Shirley Temple collector's classic
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children in motion pictures
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture actors and actresses
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Excerpts
Music & Performing Arts/Motion picture actors and actresses
abstract: Kid in Hollywood (1933, dir. Charles Lamont, 10:00 mins)--Polly Tix in Washington (1933, dir. Charles Lamont, 11:00 mins)--The Pie-covered wagon (1932, dir. Charles Lamont, 10:00 mins)--Kid in Africa (1933, dir. Jack Hays, 10:00 mins)
description: A collection of film excerpts and short films starring Hollywood's favourite child actor, Shirley Temple. The four short films are interspersed with scenes from "The Little princess". Quality is inconsistent and there is no narration or introduction.
